title: President Donald J. Trump has signed the Commission Appointing Judge Brett M. Kavanaugh to be an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
October 6, 2018
President Donald J. Trump has signed the commission appointing Judge Brett M. Kavanaugh to be an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. He may now be officially sworn in.
